title: Google can't seem to issue a return label for my Pixel 4xl.. still within 15 day window.
content:
I am trying to return my Pixel 4Xl. As of November 1st I was still well within the 15 day return period. I never received the return option on order page, so I called for assistance. They said they were having trouble creating the return label and that my request had to be escalated. 

Fast forward 2 whole weeks and I still haven't gotten a return label. I've called multiple times and they can't seem to figure out how to issue a label. 

Any thoughts on how to move forward? 
I've never had a bad experience with Google support up until now, but this has been terrible.
